train: Walk straight, turn left to the counter.
Pick up the knife on the table.
Slice the green vegetable on the table.
Walk straight, turn right to the fridge.
Open the fridge, put the knife inside the fridge. Close the fridge
Turn right, walk straight, turn left to the counter.
Take a slice of the vegetable.
Turn left, walk straight, turn right to the fridge.
Open the fridge, put the slice next to the knife. Close the fridge. Open the fridge, take the slice, close the fridge.
Turn right, walk straight, turn right, turn right, turn right to the counter.
Put the slice on the counter.
Turn left at the wooden stool and walk to the white table on the left.
Pick up the knife with the yellow handle from the middle of the table.
Slice the head of lettuce on the table.
Turn left and walk to the fridge on the right.
Put the knife inside the fridge on the top shelf to the left of the loaf of bread and close the door.
Turn right and walk to the white table on the left.
Pick up a slice of lettuce from the table.
Turn left and walk to the fridge on the right.
Put the slice of lettuce inside the fridge on the top shelf behind the knife, chill it, remove it and close the door.
Turn right, head to the wooden stool on the right and turn around to face the white table.
Put the chilled slice of lettuce on the table in front of the head of lettuce.
Turn left to move to the white table.
Pick up the sharp knife from the white table.
Use the knife to slice the head of lettuce.
Carry the knife to the fridge, which is to your left.
Place the knife on the top shelf of the fridge.
Turn right and move back to stand in front of the lettuce on the table.
Pick up a piece of lettuce from the table.
Turn left and carry the slice of lettuce to the fridge.
Place the lettuce on the top shelf of the fridge, close the door, and then remove the lettuce after a couple seconds.
Turn right and carry the lettuce to stand back in front of the table.
Place the cold lettuce slice on the table in front of the rest of the head of lettuce.
valid_seen: turn to the right twice and to to the end of the counter top and turn to the left and go to the end of the counter top
take the knife from the counter top
turn to the left and go to the front of the refrigerator and turn to the left and go to the refrigerator
open the refrigerator door and slice up the potato on the shelf with the knife and close the refrigerator door
turn to the right twice and take a few steps and turn to the left and go to the microwave
open the microwave door and put the knife in it and close the microwave door
turn to the left twice and take a few step and turn to the right and go to the refrigerator
open the refrigerator door and take a potato slice from the shelf and close the refrigerator door
turn to the right twice and take a few steps and turn to the left and go to the microwave
put the potato slice in the microwave and cook it and when finish cooking take out the potato slice from the microwave
turn to the right twice and take a few steps and turn to the left and go to the sink
put the potato slice in the sink
Go to the counter across the room from the stove.
Pick up the butter knife on the counter.
Cut the potato in the fridge.
Take the knife to the microwave.
Put the knife in the microwave.
Pick up the potato slice in the fridge.
Take the potato slice to the microwave.
Cook the potato in the microwave.
Take the cooked potato slice to the sink.
Put the potato slice in the sink.
Turn right, turn right, walk straight, turn left, walk to the counter
Pick up the knife on top of the counter
Turn left, walk straight, turn left, walk straight to the fridge
Open the fridge, slice the egg inside, close the fridge
Turn right, turn right, walk straight to the oven
Open the microwave, put the knife inside, close the microwave
Turn left, turn left, walk straight, turn right, walk straight to the fridge
Open the fridge, take out the sliced egg inside, close the fridge
Turn right, turn right, walk straight to the oven
Open the microwave, put the sliced egg inside, close the microwave, turn on the microwave. Open the microwave, take out the sliced egg inside, close the microwave.
Turn right, turn right, turn left, walk straight to the sink
Put the sliced egg in the sink
